TERMS_ACCEPTABLE_USE_CONTENT: Users agree to use the Platform for lawful and constructive purposes only. Prohibited activities include fraudulent requests, harassment, impersonation, exploitation, and hate speech. Violations may result in suspension or permanent banning.
TERMS_CONTACT_CONTENT: For any questions, contact us at ğŸ“§ info@SaayamForAll.org or ğŸ“ Saayam For All, 3046 Rosato Ct., San Jose, California 95135.
TERMS_DISCLAIMERS_CONTENT: We do not verify professional qualifications unless explicitly mentioned. Interactions are based on mutual trust. We disclaim liability for consequences arising from platform interactions.
TERMS_ELIGIBILITY_CONTENT: To use Saayam For All, individuals must be at least 18 years of age or must use the Platform under the supervision and consent of a legal guardian. By registering, you affirm that the information you provide is accurate and that you are legally permitted to use our services under your local jurisdiction.
TERMS_ENTIRE_AGREEMENT_CONTENT: These Terms and our Privacy Policy constitute the entire agreement between you and Saayam.
TERMS_GOVERNING_LAW_CONTENT: These Terms are governed by the laws of our registered jurisdiction. Disputes will be resolved as appropriate under local laws.
TERMS_INDEMNIFICATION_CONTENT: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Saayam and its affiliates from any claims arising out of your use of the Platform or violation of these Terms.
TERMS_INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_CONTENT: All content on the Platform is owned or licensed by us. You may not copy or distribute it without permission. User-generated content grants us a license to use it for operational and promotional purposes.
TERMS_INTRO: Welcome to Saayam For All ("Saayam", "we", "us", or "our"). By accessing or using our websites (including saayam.org, saayamforall.org, and saayamforall.com), mobile applications, or services (collectively, the "Platform"), you agree to be bound by the following Terms and Conditions. These Terms are designed to inform you of your rights and responsibilities as a user, volunteer, or organization interacting with our community-driven, humanitarian platform.
TERMS_LIMITATIONS_CONTENT: We are not a replacement for emergency services and do not provide licensed medical, legal, or financial advice. Verification of volunteers is basic and does not constitute formal background checks. Use the platform at your own discretion and risk.
TERMS_LIMITATION_LIABILITY_CONTENT: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect or consequential damages from your use of the Platform.
TERMS_MISSION_CONTENT: Saayam For All is a humanitarian platform rooted in compassion, built entirely by volunteers and experts who believe in service to others. Our mission is to bridge the gap between people in need and those who are willing to help. The platform is inspired by the principles of selfless service, inclusivity, and technological empowerment. We aim to be a global hub where anyone can request essential assistance, and volunteers can offer their support without the expectation of compensation.
TERMS_MODIFICATIONS_CONTENT: We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.
TERMS_NON_DISCRIMINATION_CONTENT: We serve all individuals regardless of race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability, nationality, or political belief. Violations of this standard may lead to removal.
TERMS_OVERVIEW_CONTENT: Saayam For All is a volunteer-based organization that helps connect people in need with compassionate local volunteers. We operate through a cloud-native application that supports requests for essentials such as food, housing, education, healthcare, clothing, and general guidance. This platform is driven by values of service, inclusion, and humanity, and is free of religious, political, or commercial bias. By using Saayam For All, you accept and agree to abide by these Terms in full.
TERMS_PRIVACY_CONTENT: We collect only necessary data to operate the Platform. We do not sell your information. Your data may be shared only to fulfill requests or improve services. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details.
TERMS_SERVICES_CONTENT: Saayam For All acts as a connector and facilitator. We do not directly provide emergency services or professional advice. Our services are delivered through a network of compassionate volunteers and charitable entities. We strive to match requests with support but cannot guarantee outcomes or timely responses.
TERMS_TERMINATION_CONTENT: We may suspend or terminate your access for violations. You can also deactivate your account by contacting support.
TERMS_THANK_YOU: Thank you for being a part of our mission to help humanity through technology, compassion, and community service.
TERMS_USER_ROLES_CONTENT: The Platform is composed of different user roles: Beneficiaries, Volunteers, Organizations, and Admins. Each role has specific permissions and responsibilities. Role-switching and multiple-role accounts may be allowed, provided they comply with our internal policies.
TERMS_WAIVER_SEVERABILITY_CONTENT: Failure to enforce a provision does not waive it. If any provision is invalid, the remaining provisions remain effective.
